name: GMTK 2022 - Emotion Dice
description:
Overall:

Inspired by the constant changing flow of emotions, The Emotion Dice challenge you to find a match between inner feelings and outer expression. In some cases, you need to take a leap of faith to finish the mission. Now, rolling your dice and diving into the colourful world of emotions.

Anyway, please enjoy our team's first ever game jam. Any feedbacks is also welcome.

Control:

Arrow key   -   Movement

Q                      -   Swap Character

Spacebar     -   Roll at the start point

Credit:

Nghia Lam (Coder / Art)

Nhat Doan(Game Designer / Producer)

Tham Tran (Content Writer / Designer)
